DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect creatine monohydrate vitamin D supplementation strength gain follow traditional resistance training program adult spinal cord injury .
DOC.brief_title: Creatine Vitamin D Supplementation Persons With Spinal Cord Injury Undergoing Resistance Training
DOC.criteria: Spinal cord injury Minimum time since injury : 3 month Participation resistance training programmes previous 6 month Creatine vitamin D supplementation previous 6 month
